title: Olivia Culpo outshines the Eiffel Tower as she flashes her toned legs in 'a little black dress'
text:
Olivia Culpo has been enjoying her time in Paris this month.

And, lucky for her 4.3M Instagram followers, the model has been sharing updates every day. On Wednesday the 2012 Miss Universe flashed her toned legs as she showed off a stunning outfit.

'The little black dress,' the dark haired beauty said in her caption. The designer is David Koma, a Georgian fashion designer based in London.

Powerful look: Olivia Culpo has been enjoying her time in Paris this month. And, lucky for her 4.3M Instagram followers, the model has been sharing updates every day. On Wednesday the 2012 Miss Universe flashed her toned legs as she showed off a stunning outfit

Closer look: 'The little black dress,' the dark haired beauty said in her caption. The designer is David Koma, a Georgian fashion designer based in London

The dress was eye-catching as it had a top portion with rhinestone-encrusted spaghetti straps.

There was a sheer panel in the midsection that had thin sparkly straps. The skirt part was high-waisted and very short.

Culpo seemed to have a black blazer falling down over her shoulders.

The cover girl had beautifully applied makeup with arched eyebrows, winger eyeliner and a dark pink pout.

Good design: The dress was eye-catching as it had a top portion with rhinestone-encrusted spaghetti straps. There was a sheer panel in the midsection that had thin sparkly straps. The skirt part was high-waisted and very short

She seems to have been on the balcony of her hotel which had an excellent view of the lit-up Eiffel Tower, which was built in 1887.

It has a wrought-iron lattice tower on the Champ de Mars in Paris, France. It is named after the engineer Gustave Eiffel, whose company designed and built the tower.

On Monday the 27-year-old star rocked a feathered sheer mini dress from Ralph & Russo as she walked around Paris in the Instagram she shared on Monday.

Wow factor: Culpo rocked a feathered sheer mini dress from Ralph and Russo as she walked around Paris in the Instagram she shared on Monday

Olivia flaunted her long toned legs in the long-sleeved sheer dress from the luxury fashion label.

The see-through number revealed her taupe hued underwear beneath; the sequin number featured ruffled sleeves with a statement feathered accents along the shoulders.

After making a Parisian street her own runway, Olivia posed up a storm on her hotel balcony - complete with a view of beautiful building behind her.

Olivia, who styled her short brunette tresses pulled back into a chic updo, captioned the pictures on her Instagram: 'Heading to @ralphandrusso.'

French chic: After making a Parisian street her own runway, Olivia posed up a storm on her hotel balcony - complete with a view of beautiful building behind her

Olivia was soon hours later arriving to the Ralph & Russo Womenswear Spring/Summer 2020 show during Paris Fashion Week at Le Centorial.

She was seen seated during the show next to Caroline Vreeland.

Olivia also shared a playful video as she walked up a set of stairs and then ended it as she blew kisses to the camera.

Views: She was seen seated during the show next to Caroline Vreeland

Two days prior, Olivia commanded attention in an almost all lime green ensemble; she was seen stepping out in Paris rocking a belted blazer dress.

The frock featured a statement belt buckle.

The star added a beret and a bucket bag in the same hue, but opted for Balenciaga heels in white with silver accents.

Olivia left her tresses loose around her with light pink glossed lips and cream eye shadow.
